name: Pretty Zoo
description:
Build a new safari zoo and keep expanding your zoo!
Create and care for your very own zoo from your iPhone!

LOADED WITH FEATURES:

- Build an all new safari zoo!
- More than 40 new animals to care for!
- Add your own special building
- Mix 2 animals to create fantastic new breeds with the new animal mixing feature!
- Store your animals with the new inventory feature!
- Customize your zoo with stores, restaurants, trees and attractions!
- Visit your friends' Zoos and play together!
